alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Dauphin; Perry (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 3:16PM EDT until May 22 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cumberland County in south central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Perry County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 315 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Carlisle, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Carlisle, Lower Allen, Colonial Park, Progress, Mechanicsburg, Camp Hill, New Cumberland, Linglestown, Enola, Steelton and Lemoyne. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 215 to 239. Interstate 81 from mile markers 38 to 72. Interstate 83 from mile markers 40 to 50. Interstate 283 from mile markers 1 to 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
